segments.source_content:
---
title: Where to get help
description: Where to get help
---
If you need help with your React Native app, the right place to go depends on the type of help that you need.

translations.zh-hant: 若您需要 React Native 應用程式的協助，尋求幫助的管道取決於您所需的支援類型。

segments.source_content: The core of **React Native** is worked on full-time by Meta's React Native team. But there are far more people in the community who make key contributions and fix things. If the issue you are facing is code related, you should check the open issues in the [main repository](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues).

translations.zh-hant: The core of **React Native** is worked on full-time by Meta's React Native team. But there are far more people in the community who make key contributions and fix things. If the issue you are facing is code related, you should check the open issues in the [main repository](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues).

segments.source_content: If you cannot find an existing issue, please refer to [How to report a bug](/contributing/how-to-report-a-bug).

translations.zh-hant: 若未找到相關議題，請參閱[如何回報錯誤](/contributing/how-to-report-a-bug)。

segments.source_content: Many times, when upgrading your apps and libraries from a version of React Native to a newer one, you might need some help; the community has rallied together to create a couple of important resources:

translations.zh-hant: 當您將應用程式與函式庫從某個 React Native 版本升級至新版時，可能需要協助。社群已共同建立了以下重要資源：

segments.source_content:
- [upgrade-helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) is a tool that will show the full set of changes happening between any two versions to help you see what changes you need to do in your code.
- [upgrade support](https://github.com/react-native-community/upgrade-support) is a community-driven repository to request and give help when upgrading your app.

translations.zh-hant:
- [upgrade-helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) 工具可顯示任意兩個版本間的所有變更，協助您調整程式碼。
- [upgrade support](https://github.com/react-native-community/upgrade-support) 是由社群驅動的儲存庫，可請求或提供升級應用程式的協助。

segments.source_content: Many members of the community use Stack Overflow to ask questions. Read through the [existing questions](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/react-native?sort=frequent) tagged with **react-native** or [ask your own](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=react-native)!

translations.zh-hant: Many members of the community use Stack Overflow to ask questions. Read through the [existing questions](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/react-native?sort=frequent) tagged with **react-native** or [ask your own](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=react-native)!

segments.source_content: If you need an answer right away, check out the [Reactiflux Discord](https://discord.gg/JuTwWB8rsy) community. There are usually a number of React Native experts there who can help out or point you to somewhere you might want to look.

translations.zh-hant: 若需即時解答，請加入 [Reactiflux Discord](https://discord.gg/JuTwWB8rsy) 社群。通常有許多 React Native 專家可提供協助或指引方向。
